item.description:
PLEASE READ CAREFULLY: RSVP-ing does NOT register you for this event! You MUST visit the link at the bottom of the page, get on the wait list and make your payment to be 100% registered to attend.

CLICK HERE TO REGISTER

Dating Made Easy!

The next Date 'N' Dash event is on Sunday, December 16th, 2012 for singles 25 to 40 and 40 to 55.

 

How Do I Attend This Event? - VERY IMPORTANT!

Simply CLICK HERE to register. You'll go my website where you'll join the Mailing List. After you join the mailing list, you will be sent an email with a link back to my site. Pick and click on your gender, then pick and click on the event for your age group. Join that list for that age range to make your payment. After your payment is complete, you'll automatically be returned a page on my site where you'll fill out some brief info to register for the event and below that I have a 3D digital book waiting for you with with details about and tips for the event.

- The cost of this event is $21.
- There will be a maximum of 10 pairs. 10 Men and 10 Women.
- RSVP's on this page may not be accurate reflection of who is attending.

What Can I Expect On The Day of The Event?

- You will arrive promptly at 3:30 PM. I will meet and greet you to ensure you feel comfortable and welcome.

- You will receive:

- A name tag with a number, your first name and last initial
- 2 numbered Date 'N' Dash forms; one labeled "Notes" and
one labeled "Official: To Be Passed In"
- Some folded paper for your own personal notes and a pen.

- The numbered name tags and forms are for you to keep track of the dates you like. You will turn these in to us at the end of the night.

- There will be a line of tables set up with chairs on each side on the day of the event. You will sit down in a numbered order according to the number on your name tag.

- At 4 PM I will explain the rules of the event to the group (please do not ask beforehand), making sure that everyone understands how the evening works.

- You will have somewhere between 6 to 8 minutes to chat to your date (very important, remember to take notes!) and then I will ask the men to move to the right one spot until the end and then circle back to the beginning.

- At the end I will ask you to turn in your paper with the dates you've chosen to see again.

- I will e-mail you a couple of days after the event has ended with you matches name, e-mail address and phone number. Then it is up to you to contact your matches and set up a real date.

Open Socializing Time After The Event

After the event there will be time for everyone to socialize with all of the other participants. I will be available starting from then onward and he can provide additional help or even suggest some of the paid classes I offer so you know there is additional help and you have options after this event has ended if you need it.

I'm really looking forward to meeting you at this event, and I'll see you there!

~Matt

To Sign Up For Date 'N' Dash on 12/16 - CLICK HERE

 

Invited Groups:

Boston Singles

http://www.meetup.com/BostonSingles

Social Fun

http://www.meetup.com/SocialFun/events/93945422/
item.name: Date 'N' Dash – 25 to 40 - 0m/4w spots left!
